game.name: Do Not Touch The Border
game.description:
The complex games have already got you bored and you are now seeking an easy and simple gameplay. If this is the case, you must try out Do Not Touch The Border right away and gear up to get participated in a game that is not too long to play and offers the matchless fun moments by putting just a few efforts. In this brand new arcade challenge, you have to control a small white colour ball that wants to reach to a top place.

Hey friends! The gameplay of this cool HTML5 ball game is so simple and easy that you will fall in love with it. Try to move your ball left or right and make sure that it does not touch with any of the borders you see on the screen! All you need to do is just put your finger on the arrow keys and give your ball the needful directions so that it can avoid all the obstacles. Guide the movements of the ball perfectly to set your new high score!

The major characteristics of this ball game includes 1 survival mode and 2 unique and highly addictive levels to play through. Choose any out of easy and super hard and get ready to enter the biggest fun possible of your life! Our free online game website includes countless arcade fun games that you can play on multiple devices including desktops, mobile phones, tablets, and iPhones or iPads. Enjoy many other free arcade games and have fun alone or with your friends without download!
